mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_case (case_title, importance_level, preconditions, created_by, execution_time, created_at, last_modified_by, case_type, execution_result, remarks, attachments) VALUES (#{caseTitle}, #{importanceLevel}, #{preconditions}, #{createdBy}, #{executionTime}, #{createdAt}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{caseType}, #{executionResult}, #{remarks}, #{attachments})
mapper.update: UPDATE test_case SET case_title = #{caseTitle}, importance_level = #{importanceLevel}, preconditions = #{preconditions}, created_by = #{createdBy}, execution_time = #{executionTime}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, case_type = #{caseType}, execution_result = #{executionResult}, remarks = #{remarks}, attachments = #{attachments} WHERE case_id = #{caseId}
